CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Diversified Energy Company plc Ordinary Shares

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1800 CORPORATE DRIVE, BIRMINGHAM, Alabama, 35242, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Diversified Energy Co PLC is an independent owner and operator of producing natural gas and oil wells concentrated in the Appalachian Basin. The company acquires and manages gas and oil properties and certain associated midstream assets. Its operations are located throughout the neighboring states of Tennessee, Kentucky, Virginia, West Virginia, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Oklahoma, Texas, and Louisiana.
